tags.name: France - Italy (section nord)
tags.note:important: Be careful, this section is the border claimed by France but some parts are disputed by Italy. Use this relation only for France ! (see wikipedia link).
tags.note:important2: Be careful not to confuse sections and ways (this section is composed of ways south of the borders claimed by Italy but stays the north part of all borders France-Italy
